data.name: Dimensional Drift
data.detailed_description:
Dimensional Drift is a racing game, but instead of racing in a normal world, you race in different dimensions.
It has high quality graphics and amazing game feel, and a variety of different cars from different manufacturers.
Dimensional Drift has driving mechanics that are acradey and fun, while still retaining some realism.
There is an XP system and cool rewards for levelling up.
A controller or steering wheel is recommended for the best experience.


Dimensional Drift features 4 different dimensions and 20 unique tracks!
- The Rater Dimension is filled with mystical blue crystals
- The Fungal Dimension is a forest of giant mushrooms
- The Candy Dimension is a sweet-tooth's dream
- The Hell Dimension is the land of lava



Create your own tracks with the level editor and share them with your friends for them to play. The level editor brings limitless possibilities, your imagination is the limit.
data.about_the_game:
Dimensional Drift is a racing game, but instead of racing in a normal world, you race in different dimensions.
It has high quality graphics and amazing game feel, and a variety of different cars from different manufacturers.
Dimensional Drift has driving mechanics that are acradey and fun, while still retaining some realism.
There is an XP system and cool rewards for levelling up.
A controller or steering wheel is recommended for the best experience.


Dimensional Drift features 4 different dimensions and 20 unique tracks!
- The Rater Dimension is filled with mystical blue crystals

data.short_description: Race through 4 unique dimensions in a ton of different cars with arcade-style driving. Unleash your inner racer as you explore these beautiful worlds. Upgrade your cars, paint them, make them monster trucks. Put on your seat belt, lets do this.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 7th Gen Intel Core i5 or Zen+ AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 8th Gen Intel Core i5 or Zen2 AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: 7th Gen Intel Core i5 or Apple M1
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon or M1 Integrated Graphics
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Big Sur 11.0
  • Processor: 8th Gen Intel Core i5 or Apple M1 Pro
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon or M1 Pro Integrated Graphics

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS 3 or Ubuntu 16
  • Processor: 7th Gen Intel Core i5 or Zen+ AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 or AMD RX 570
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: SteamOS 3 or Ubuntu 20
  • Processor: 8th Gen Intel Core i5 or Zen2 AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD RX 580
